Files Headings

stage.html
¶ 
<!DOCTYPE html>
¶

This page displays widgets which pulls its stories from a staging CI magazine. It is intended for testing purposes only.

 

<html>
    <head>
        <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=utf-8">
        <title>Styla Cards Widget Demo</title>
        <style>
            body
            {
                margin:                 0 auto;
                background:             #eee;
                height:                 100vh;
            }

            h1,
            h2
            {
                text-align:             center;
            }

            .styla-widget__cards,
            .styla-widget__list,
            .styla-widget__tiles,
            .styla-widget__horizontal,
            .styla-widget__stories
            {
                text-align:             left;
                background:             #FFF;
                box-shadow:             3px 3px 0px #ccc;
                height:                 24em;
                position:               relative;
                display:                block;
                margin:                 0 auto;
            }
        </style>
    </head>
    <body>
        <h1>Stage widget</h1>
        <p style="text-align:center">Displaying stories from <a href="http://oxid.stage.eu.magalog.net/magazine/">http://oxid.stage.eu.magalog.net/magazine/</a> </p>

        <h2>Cards view, non-minified, latest</h2>
        <div class="styla-widget__cards" style="width: 90%;"></div>
        <script src="./cards.js"></script>
        <script>
            new StylaWidget_Cards( {
                newTab  : true,
                slug    : 'ci-oxid4',
                api     : 'http://stage.magalog.net',
                target  : '.styla-widget__cards',
                limit   : 4,
                cta     : 'Read more'
            } );
        </script>

        <h2>Horizontal view, non-minified, v2</h2>
        <div class="styla-widget__horizontal" style="width: 90%;"></div>
        <script src="./horizontal.v2.js"></script>
        <script>
            new StylaWidget_Horizontal( {
                newTab  : true,
                slug    : 'ci-oxid4',
                api     : 'http://stage.magalog.net',
                target  : '.styla-widget__horizontal',
                limit   : 4,
                cta     : 'Read more'
            } );
        </script>

        <h2>Tiles view, minified, v2</h2>
        <div class="styla-widget__tiles" style="width: 90%;"></div>
        <script src="./tiles.v2.min.js"></script>
        <script>
            new StylaWidget_Tiles( {
                newTab  : true,
                slug    : 'ci-oxid4',
                api     : 'http://stage.magalog.net',
                target  : '.styla-widget__tiles',
                limit   : 4,
            } );
        </script>

        <h2>List view, minified, v2</h2>
        <div class="styla-widget__list" style="width: 90%; height: 80vh;"></div>
        <script src="./list.v2.min.js"></script>
        <script>
            new StylaWidget_List( {
                newTab  : true,
                slug    : 'ci-oxid4',
                api     : 'http://stage.magalog.net',
                target  : '.styla-widget__list',
                limit   : 4,
            } );
        </script>

        <h2>Stories view, minified, v2<h2>
        <div class="styla-widget__stories" style="width: 90%;"></div>
        <script src="./stories.v2.min.js"></script>
        <script>
            new StylaWidget_Stories( {
                newTab  : true,
                slug    : 'ci-oxid4',
                api     : 'http://stage.magalog.net',
                target  : '.styla-widget__stories',
                limit   : 4,
            } );
        </script>
    </body>
</html>
